description: Offensive language is strictly prohibited. Respect for all players is required.
Refrain from spamming the chat with repeated messages or excessive use of CAPS lock.
Advertising other servers or external websites is not allowed, except for links to our domains like https://ampznetwork.com.
All players must be treated with respect. Any form of harassment, bullying, or discrimination is unacceptable.
Altering or destroying another player's build without consent is forbidden.
The use of mods or hacks to gain an unfair advantage is not permitted.
Please avoid topics that are sensitive, such as politics or religion, to keep the chat appropriate.
Do not share personal information to protect your privacy and safety.
English should be used in the global chat to ensure clear communication for all.
Report any problems or inappropriate behavior to a staff member without delay.
